table.internal-type: whatever the database calls the type such as varchar(255), int8, numeric(10,2), etc etc
table.db-adaptor-type: the Java type for configuring the db-adaptor - STRING, LONG, DOUBLE, DATE, TIMESTAMP, LOCAL_DATE or LOCAL_TIME.
table.domain-property-type: the best guess equivalent domain property type - STRING, NUMBER, INTEGER or BOOLEAN.
